en.title: ENTRETIEN DOMESTIQUE MONTREAL
en.description: Entretien Domestique Montreal is a maintenance service company owned and operated by individuals with professional knowledge and skills. With over 10 years of combined experience, we are proud to be able to offer a range of services executed to a high standard.

items.question: ARE QUOTES FREE?
items.answer: Yes, 100% free and they come with no obligation to book a service.

items.question: ARE THERE ANY OTHER SERVICES EDM PROVIDES?
items.answer: We very regularly perform miscellaneous tasks and attend to hard to reach spaces. Elevated light bulb replacement, crawl spaces, roof debris clearance, overhanging branches for example. Please by all means just ask.

items.question: WHAT AREAS DO YOU COVER?
items.answer: Montreal and a radius including Saint Lazare, Laval, North/South Shore, Vaudreuil-Dorion. We are prepared to travel further at a quoted rate.
